title: Teach me how to German, Teach me Teach me how to German
body:
Terrible Title aside, Its Tear here ^^
I want to apologise first coz i posted a simular topic already but i had little luck with it..

Namely i would like to learn german language, and i would also like to find some active german players that i could play league leggends with on potencialy daily basis. i would like to learn german language and expand my vocabulary the fun way. As my german is still in development, it would be great if you knew a little bit of english. i use things like Skype or Teamspeak
i am on EU West, In game name is LonelyTear, i dont play ranked due to lack of time, im openminded and all around okay guy.
i look forward to meet you

replies.body: My english is not the yellow from the egg :)

I want to thank everyone here who has sent me friend request and offered to help. you guys are awesome, but i want to apologise for something too.
With so many people at once, im kinda losing myself coz i want to answer and play with everyone here.. but i just dont have enough time. So i wanted to apologise if i cant answer and play with everyone but i still wanted to thank you for offering your help.

Yea i could help you :)
Hahahaha :))
Thank you, see you on the fields
Teach me how to english and i teach you how to german.
I would help too, but i would speak half english and german with dialect. :D
